operators.name: Wallshot
operators.description: Deploys a one-way transparent wall that Wallshot can shoot through. Enemies cannot shoot through the wall.
operators.notes: Wall persists for `duration_seconds`. Shooting through the wall reduces player recoil by 10%. Only one wall active per player.

operators.name: Flashguard
operators.description: Emits a flash that blinds (90% screen fog) players who are looking toward Flashguard when it triggers.
operators.notes: If the enemy looks away before windup completes, they avoid the flash. Friendly players are unaffected.

operators.name: Duelmaster
operators.description: Teleports Duelmaster and the nearest enemy within 20 meters into a 1v1 duel room. The loser dies; the winner returns.
operators.notes: Duel room is small, no cover, and has low gravity (optional). If no enemy found, ability fails and refunds 50% cooldown.

operators.name: Gravity Breaker
operators.description: Creates a short-range gravity field that pulls enemies toward the field center and reduces their jump by 60%.
operators.notes: Players pulled off platform edges are vulnerable to lava fall; works on bots.
